K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:101b-10: rdo rje thal mos rdo rje'i gar byed cing bskor bas snying gar me tog thogs te bdag nyid 'jug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:101b-11: zhugs nas kyang rnam par sgeg pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:101b-12: bskor bas gdung zhing snying po yang bzlas brjod bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:101b-13: de nas bcom ldan 'das la rdo rje'i lta bas bltas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:101b-14: de bzhin du 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das bsgrub par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:102a-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa bdag nyid la dgyes @102a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:102a-1: pas mthong ba stsol bar 'gyur zhing smin ma bskyod la sku thams cad dam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:102a-2: yan lag rnams bskyod cing kha dog dmar por 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:102a-3: 'od zer gyi rang bzhin gyi zhal lam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:102a-4: sku thams cad ston par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:102a-5: cho 'phrul dpag tu med pa yang ston par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:102a-6: de nas bcom ldan 'das bdag nyid mthong ba stsol ba'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:102a-7: dngos grub mchog kyang stsol bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:102a-8: de nas brtsams te nyin re zhing dngos grub thams cad 'thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:102a-9: gang du zhugs pa tsam nyid kyis mi tshugs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:102a-12: phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:102a-14: bya ba thams cad bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes sgrub par mdzad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:102a-15: de nas de yang dag par mchod de rdo rje'i ming gis dbang bskur zhing dpa' bo'i rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la mnos la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:102a-16: snying po bzlas nas bcom ldan 'das mthong ba stsal nas rang nyid kyis stsol cig ces brjod la rang gis blang bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:102a-17: de nas skad cig de nyid la dngos grub mchog yid la 'dod pa 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:102a-18: yang na bdag nyid kyis zla ba drug gis yid la 'dod pa'i dngos grub mchog 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:102b-0: @102b de nas rdo rje ming gi dbang bskur ba la sogs pa yang de bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:102b-1: de nas byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa yang byas nas yang ji ltar 'dod pa'i cho gas bsgrubs la 'byung bar bya zhing dkyil 'khor chen po'i gsang ba bsgrub pa lan gcig bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:102b-2: de nas slob ma gzhug par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:102b-3: de la dang por rdo rje slob dpon gyis dang po'i rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya bcings la 'jug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:102b-4: zhugs nas de bzhin du phyag byas la snying pos ci ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i tshig dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:102b-5: bcom ldan 'das bsgrubs pas phyag rgya chen pos bsgrub par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:102b-6: de nas bcom ldan 'das bsgrubs pas mtshan ma de nyid 'byung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:102b-7: shes nas phyag rgya chen po nyid 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:102b-8: dngos grub thams cad kyang 'grub par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:102b-9: zhugs pa 'dis ni rdo rje slob dpon bdag nyid de bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:102b-10: de nas de bzhin du rdo rje blang ba la sogs pa byas nas rdo rje slob ma la cho ga rgyas pa 'di bzhin du byas te phyag rgya bcing ba yang bslab par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:102b-11: gang yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la sogs pa'i dam tshig la mos pa de rnams la yang rang gi lhag pa'i lha'i 'jug pa'i cho ga rgyas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:102b-12: de bzhin du yid la 'dod pa'i dngos grub thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:103a-1: lha gzhan dag la dad pa rnams la de bzhin du 'jug pa'i cho ga rgyas par byas nas de bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:103a-2: de nas ji ltar zhugs pa rnams zas dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:103a-4: gnas pa la sogs pa thams cad kyis yang dag par tshim par byas la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:103a-5: ji ltar shes pa'i gar dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:103a-12: gnyen mtshams dang bcas pas kyang mchod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:103a-14: snod ma yin pa brtag par mi bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:103a-15: sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams bde ba chen po rdo rje'i dam tshig 'di dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:103a-16: 'dod pa'i bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i rdo rje'i sbyor bas rdo rje chos kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa yin pa'i phyir dkyil 'khor chen po'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:103a-18: zla ba nya nas brtsams nas phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sngar rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya bcings la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:103a-19: ji ltar skyo bar ma gyur par dang por byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa byas la rdo rje'i tshig gis brjod cing ji srid zla ba gcig gi bar de srid du bzlas brjod byas na sngon du bsnyen pa byas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:103b-0: de nas brtsams te phyag na rdo rje'i bka' ji lta ba bzhin du dngos grub thams cad 'grub @103b par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:103b-2: 'drir gzhug par 'dod na dang por rdo rje bri ba'i phyag rgyas bris la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:103b-3: de'i 'og tu ni ci bder bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:103b-4: dkyil 'khor thams cad du yang de nyid kyis dang por brtsam par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:103b-5: dbus su bcom ldan 'das cho ga ji lta bzhin du bri zhing dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul gyis sems dpa' chen po brgyad bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:103b-6: de nas zla ba nya nas brtsams te phyag rgya chen po bcings la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:103b-7: de bzhin du sngon du bsnyen pa'i tshul ltar bzlas nas zla ba nya pa'i mtshan mo thog thag ji lta ba bzhin du skyo bar ma gyur pas phyag rgya ma bkrol bar bzlas brjod bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:103b-8: de nas nang par bcom ldan 'das kyis zhal 'dzum zhing zla ba dang mnyam pa'i mdangs can mthong ba stsol cing sangs rgyas nyid dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:103b-9: rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid la sogs pa'i dngos grub mchog rnams stsol bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:103b-10: cho ga gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa' chen po brgyad kyis yongs su bskor ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:103b-11: phyogs thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:103b-12: rdo rje 'chang ba thams cad bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:103b-13: de nas de bzhin du bsgrubs pas sangs rgyas kyi nyid la sogs pa dngos grub thams cad 'grub po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:103b-14: ras la bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje bsnyems pa dang bcas pa bris la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:104a-0: @104a *// de'i spyan sngar dang po'i phyag rgya chen pos gnas nas bzlas brjod 'bum byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:104a-1: 'bum rdzogs na phyag na rdo rje nyid thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:104a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa dpa' bo gcig pa bris nas yang mthar 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:104a-3: de nas bklags pa tsam gyis 'grub pa'i las rnams dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur ba ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:104a-5: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rjes su mnyes par bya ba la ni 'dod chags la sogs pa bde ba thams cad phul bas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:104a-6: rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po mnyes par bya ba la ni rdo rje sems dpa' dang 'khyud cing 'o byed pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:104a-7: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad rjes su mnyes par bya ba la ni dpag tu med pa'i bzlas pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:104a-8: rdo rjes thams cad rjes su mnyes par bya ba la ni rang gi snying po bzlas pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:104a-9: lha la sogs pa sems can thams cad rjes su chags par bya ba la ni thams cad du 'bum bzlas pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:104a-10: bdag bsrung ba la ni yungs kar la lan gcig bzlas pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:104a-11: gzhan bsrung ba la ni rdo rje bskor bas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:104a-12: thams cad bsrung ba la ni yid kyis lan gcig go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:104a-15: dkyil 'khor thams cad bcing ba la ni blta ba'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:104b-0: @104b yungs kar la sogs pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:104b-1: sems can thams cad rengs par bya ba la ni dbugs mi 'byin par bzlas pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:104b-2: sems can thams cad rmugs par bya ba la ni rdo rje btsir bas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:104b-3: sems can thams cad rmongs par bya ba la ni mig btsum nas bzlas pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:104b-4: thams cad gsad pa la ni rdo rje bral bas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:104b-5: sems can thams cad rgyas gdab pa la ni rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'i phyag rgyas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:104b-6: snying thams cad 'dren cing 'byin pa la ni yid kyis bzlas pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:104b-7: sems can thams cad za ba la ni ldang zhing myur bas zlos pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:104b-8: sems can thams cad skrag par bya ba la ni rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi phyag rgyas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:104b-9: nor thams cad dgug pa la ni gser gyis bzlas pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:104b-11: 'bru thams cad dgug pa la ni rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i phyag rgyas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:104b-12: thams cad rjes su chags par bya ba la ni pi wang brdung ba dang bcas pa'i ka ka la'i glu len pas bzlas brjod bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:104b-14: rjes su chags par bya ba la ni rdo rje mda'i phyag rgyas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:104b-15: thams cad chags par bya ba la ni phyogs thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa mnyes pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:104b-16: gdug pa'i 'ching ba brtan par bya ba la ni snying brtan por nges par 'tshir bas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:105a-0: ma rungs pa rab tu bsgrub pa la ni rdo rje @105a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:105a-2: rgyan thams cad dbrog pa la ni 'bar ba'i blta bas dbrog pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:105a-3: thams cad yid tshim pa la ni rdo rje khu tshur snying khar bzhag pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:105a-4: mun pa snang bar bya ba la ni rdo rje kha shar du bltas te bskor bas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:105a-5: lus bde bar bya ba la ni rang gi mtshan gyi bzlas pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:105a-6: gzugs thams cad snang bar bya ba la ni rdo rje gzugs kyi mchog gi phyag rgyas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:105a-7: sgra thams cad thos par bya ba la ni rdo rje pi wang gis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:105a-8: dri zhim po sna tshogs pa'i phyir ni sna'i dbugs 'byin pa'i glu yis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:105a-11: bcud thams cad spo ba la ni rdo rje spo bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:105a-12: dbab pa thams cad la ni mnyam pa'i thal mo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:105a-15: thams cad gar byed du gzhug pa la bdag nyid gar byed cing bzlas pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:105a-16: thams cad glu len du gzhug pa la ni lce bskyod cing bzlas pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:105a-17: thams cad smrar gzhug pa la ni rdo rje ma chu yis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:105a-18: thams cad babs nas lan ston pa la ni rdo rje 'bebs pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:105a-19: gdon thams cad las thar bar bya ba la ni rdo rje myu gu'i phyag rgyas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:105b-0: gdon thams cad 'dzin du gzhug pa @105b la ni tshogs kyi bdag po rab tu dga' ba'i khro bos bzlas pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:105b-1: rims nad thams cad 'dzin du gzhug pa la ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi gdon gyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:105b-2: rims thams cad bsal ba la ni rdo rje'i lta bas bsal bas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:105b-3: dug thams cad sbar ba la ni rdo rje lta ba'i dug gi phyag rgyas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:105b-4: dug thams cad gzhig pa la ni rma bya'i chun bos so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:105b-5: dug thams cad bza' ba la ni rdo rje bdud rtsi'i phyag rgyas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:105b-6: bdud la sogs pa ma rungs pa thams cad brlag pa la ni 'khrugs pas dpag tu med par bzlas pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:105b-7: mkha' 'gro ma'i gdon thams cad las grol bar bya ba la ni rdo rje chen po gsor ba'i phyag rgyas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:105b-8: phyag rgya thams cad gzhig pa la ni rdo rje 'phen pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:105b-9: mkha' 'gro ma thams cad dgug pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:105b-11: gdul ba la ni rdo rje kha tv'am ga'i phyag rgya 'dzin pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:105b-12: ma mo thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:105b-18: gsang ba gzhig pa la ni rdo rje khro bo'i yi ge phat kyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:105b-20: mkha' 'gro ma thams cad mngag gzhug par bya ba la ni ma mo'i gnas su khros pas bzlas brjod 'bum bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:105b-21: bdud thams cad kyi stobs gzhom pa la ni rdo rje drag po'i ha ha zhes bya ba'i gad rgyangs kyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:106a-0: @106a *// gzhan gyi dpung thams cad gzhom pa la ni rdo rje la yongs su bzlas la 'phang ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:106a-1: 'thab pa thams cad las thar bar bya ba la ni rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyi phyag rgyas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:106a-2: thams cad bcing ba la ni gos la mdud pa bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:106a-3: thams cad dgrol ba la ni yi ge mu yis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:106a-5: 'khrul 'khor thams cad gzhig pa la ni rdo rje 'jigs byed kyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:106a-6: lcags sgrog thams cad dgrol ba la ni rdo rje khab long gis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:106a-7: me yang dag par bskyed pa la ni rdo rje me shel gyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:106a-8: chu med par chu yang dag par bskyed pa la ni rdo rje chu shel gyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:106a-12: rgyan thams cad la sogs pa yo byad mang po 'byung ba la ni nam mkha' la lta zhing bzlas brjod 'bum bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:106a-13: nam mkha' las sangs rgyas kyi sku la sogs pa gzugs thams cad ston pa la ni sangs rgyas rjes su dran la nam mkhar lta zhing bzlas pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:106a-14: nam mkha' las yi ges 'das pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:106a-16: da ltar byung ba'i lung bsgo ba bden par ston pa la ni yi ge aa bris la bzlas brjod 'bum byas pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:106a-17: pra se na thams cad las 'das pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:106b-0: da ltar byung ba'i lung bsgo @106b ba bden par ston pa la ni rdo rje pra se na thams cad dbab pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:106b-1: de bzhin du mig gis bden pa thams cad mthong ba la ni rang gi mig la bzlas pa 'bum byas pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:106b-2: rna bas thos par bya ba la ni rang gi rna ba la bzlas pa 'bum byas pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:106b-3: rnas mnam par bya ba la ni sna la bzlas pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:106b-4: lces rang nyid smra ba la ni lce la bzlas pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:106b-5: lus kyis reg par bya ba la ni lus la bzlas pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:106b-6: yid kyis shes par bya ba la ni yid la 'bum bzlas pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:106b-7: rmad du byung ba thams cad bstan pa la ni sangs rgyas kyi sku bsgrubs pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:106b-8: sgyu ma thams cad bstan pa la ni rma bya'i sgro'i chun po la 'bum bzlas pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:106b-9: thams cad g-yog par bya ba la ni zhi ba'i gnas su 'bum bzlas pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:106b-10: thams cad la lan ldon par bya ba la ni rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi rdo rjes so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:106b-11: rdzu 'phrul thams cad bstan pa la ni rdo rje rdzu 'phrul gyi phyag rgyas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:106b-12: cho 'phrul thams cad bstan pa la ni rdo rje ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgyas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:106b-13: rang gi lus la sogs pa dngos po thams cad las sangs rgyas dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:106b-14: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa rgyu ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:106b-15: mi rgyu ba'i dngos po thams cad bstan pa la ni rdo rje rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:107a-0: lha thams cad dbab pa la ni rdo rje bskor bas @107a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:107a-2: klu thams cad rjes su 'brang bar bya ba la ni klu'i rgyal po'i mtshor bzlas brjod bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:107a-3: gnod sbyin thams cad mngag gzhug par bya ba la ni rdo rje'i bka' bsgo bas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:107a-4: 'byung po thams cad gdul ba la ni lha chen po mnan nas khros pas bzlas brjod bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:107a-5: ser ba thams cad bzlog pa la ni rdo rje srid srung gi phyag rgyas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:107a-6: glog 'bab pa thams cad bzlog pa la ni rdo rje khro gnyer can gyi phyag rgyas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:107a-7: char dbab pa la ni klu'i mtshor bzlas brjod bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:107a-8: char gcad pa la ni dri ma med pa'i chu'i sbyin blug bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:107a-9: sprin bskyed pa la ni klu bris nas bdug pas bdug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:107a-10: sprin bshig pa la ni rdo rje nam mkha'i sprin gyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:107a-11: chu med pa'i phyogs su shin tu bsil ba'i chu'i tshogs rtag tu 'byung ba la ni rdo rje klu'i phyag rgyas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:107a-12: gter thams cad shes par bya ba la ni snod du chu blug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:107a-13: gter thams cad brko ba la ni rdo rje 'jor gyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:107a-14: gter thams cad rnyed pa la ni rdo rje nor gyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:107a-15: rgyal srid thams cad thob par bya ba la ni rdo rje dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgyas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:107a-16: sa'i bdag por bya ba la ni rdo rje sems dpa'i dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgyas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:107b-0: dkyil 'khor thams cad bsgrub pa la ni rdo rje @107b 'khor lo'i phyag rgyas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:107b-1: phyag rgya thams cad bsgrub pa la ni bde ba chen po'i dam tshig gi phyag rgyas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:107b-2: dam tshig thams cad bsgrub pa la ni rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje'i phyag rgyas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:107b-3: dngos grub thams cad bsgrub pa la ni rdo rje snyems pa'i lcags kyu'i phyag rgyas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:107b-4: ma grub pa thams cad grub par ston pa la ni rdo rje grub pa'i phyag rgyas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:107b-5: rdo rje rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad bsgrub pa la ni rdo rje rig pa 'dzin pa'i phyag rgyas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:107b-6: rdo rje thams cad bsgrub pa la ni rdo rje thams cad kyi mchog gi phyag rgyas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:107b-7: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bsgrub pa la ni thugs kyi rdo rjes so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:107b-8: rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid bsgrub pa la ni rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen pos so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:107b-9: sangs rgyas nyid bsgrub pa la ni rdo rje ye shes kyi phyag rgyas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:107b-10: bde ba chen po rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig thams cad kyi rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:107b-11: dam tshig chen po'i de kho na nyid rdo rje zhes bya ba rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po rdzogs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:107b-12: rdo rje sems dpa'i rtog pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:107b-13: de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:107b-14: yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis zhi ba'i chos nyid mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par bsgrub pa zhes bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di gsungs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:108a-1: ba nyid kyi phyir rdo rje mnyam pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ni byang chub chen po'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:108a-2: don gcig pa nyid kyi phyir don gyi mnyam pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ni byang chub chen po'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:108a-3: ngo bo nyid rnam par dag pa nyid kyi phyir chos kyi mnyam pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ni byang chub chen po'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:108a-4: thams cad la rnam par mi rtog pa nyid kyi phyir thams cad mnyam pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ni byang chub chen po'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:108a-6: gang la la chos mngon par bsgrub pa bzhi po 'di dag nyan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:108a-9: sgom pa de sdig pa thams cad spyod kyang byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du ngan song thams cad las yang dag par 'das par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:108a-10: de nas de skad ces bka' stsal nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:108a-11: bcom ldan 'das ye shes kyi khu tshur yongs su 'dzin pa'i don gyi gnas 'dir nyid rgya cher ston cing bzhin 'dzum pa dang bcas te chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi snying po 'di gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:108a-13: aa:/ de nas 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang dag par 'dus par mdzad nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:108b-0: bcom ldan 'das kyi phyogs thams cad du rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil @108b 'khor chen po'i tshul gyis bzhugs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:108b-1: sems dpa' chen po brgyad phyi'i dkyil 'khor du phyogs brgyad du bzhad pa chen pos bzhad cing bzhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:108b-2: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid rdo rje zhes bya ba'i dam tshig chen po'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:108b-3: rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du phyi'i dkyil 'khor bris la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:108b-4: de'i dbus su thig gsum gyi 'khor lo bris nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thad kar sna tshogs padmar rab tu gnas pa de'i 'khor lo'i lte ba la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pa chen po sa la sogs pa las byas pa gzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:108b-5: de'i phyogs thams cad du sa la sogs pa las byas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa brgyad gzhag gam bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:108b-6: de nas tshon gyi thig le rnams kyi dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo la bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams rdo rje 'dzin pa dang bcas pa bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:108b-7: phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyogs bzhi dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:109a-0: mtshams rnams su byang chub sems dpa' @109a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:109a-1: brgyad ci lta ba bzhin bzhag nas bum pa gang ba bzhi sgo rnams su dgod par bya zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:109a-2: byang chub kyi mtshan ma rnams gzhag par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:109a-3: shar nas brtsams te ne'u gsings dang bcas pa'i dum bu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:109a-4: ro drug gis yongs su gang zhing dbyig dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:109a-7: gos la sogs pas yongs su bkang ba'i snod dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:109a-8: 'jam zhing shin tu bde ba'i stan dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:109a-9: sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs dgod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:109a-10: de nas de bzhin du gos gyon la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i phyag rgya bcings nas zhugs na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:109a-11: bdag nyid slob dpon med par yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis rlob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:109a-12: de nas brtsams te de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rtog pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:109a-13: dngos grub thams cad la mi tshugs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:109a-15: sgrib pa thams cad dang bral ba 'thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:109a-16: de nas slob ma yang de bzhin du gzhug go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:109a-17: zhugs nas rdo rje rtse lnga pa byin la rdo rje ming gis dbang bskur ba yang sbyin par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:109a-18: de nas dam tshig 'di dag bya bar bsgo bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:109a-19: sems can kun la phan phyir dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:109a-20: bstan pa thams cad bsrung ba'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:109b-0: rnam par mi rtog @109b sbyor ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:109b-1: ci bde bar ni thams cad kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:109b-3: de nas mtshan ma bzhi 'byor pa ji lta bas skal ba ji lta ba bzhin du sbyin par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:109b-4: dam tshig chen po'i dkyil 'khor ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:109b-5: de nas sgrub pa ni ras la bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad 'dzum pa dang bcas shing de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khu tshur gyi phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:109b-6: gzhan thams cad ni dam tshig chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshul du bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:109b-7: de nas de bzhin du sems dpa' mchog sgrub pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:109b-8: dngos grub mchog rnams kyang de bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:109b-9: gzhan yang ras la bcom ldan 'das dpa' bo gcig pu bris te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:109b-10: 'di'i mdun du rdo rje'i tshig gis bzlas brjod 'bum byas nas ye shes kyi khu tshur yongs su 'dzin pas mtshan mo thog thag bzlas na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'thob cing dngos grub grub pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'gyur la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:109b-11: de nas de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:109b-12: de nas ma bsgrubs pas kyang dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa tsam nyid kyis las rnams 'grub par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:109b-14: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod pa la ni ji snyed pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i bde ba thams cad phul bas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:110a-1: cad mchod pa la ni bdag phul bas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:110a-2: dkon mchog gsum mchod pa la ni me tog la sogs pa la bzlas pa so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:110a-3: sems can thams cad mchod pa la ni thams cad la byams pa'i bzlas pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:110a-4: chos thams cad bsdu ba la ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshig bzhi po gdon pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:110a-5: bdud thams cad 'dul ba la ni brtan zhing nges pa'i bzlas pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:110a-6: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba thob pa la ni rgyan thams cad phul zhing rang nyid bcings pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:110a-7: chos nyid thams cad thob pa la ni rdo rje padma la blta bas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:110a-8: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las kyi dngos grub thob pa la ni thams cad rdo rje'i las kyi mchog gis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:110a-9: sangs rgyas nyid rab tu thob pa la ni rdo rje ye shes kyi khu tshur gyi de kho na nyid kyi phyag rgya chen pos so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:110a-10: bde ba chen po rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig gi rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:110a-11: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid rdo rje dam tshig ces bya ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po rdzogs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:110a-12: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rtog pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:110b-0: de nas ma rungs pa thams cad 'dul ba de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pas kyang yang @110b chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyis rnam par rgyal ba bsdu ba zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgrub pa 'di gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:110b-1: 'dod chags kyi spros pa med pa nyid kyis zhe sdang gi spros pa med pa nyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:110b-2: zhe sdang gi spros pa med pa nyid kyis gti mug gi spros pa med pa nyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:110b-3: gti mug gi spros pa med pa nyid kyis chos thams cad kyi spros pa med pa nyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:110b-4: chos thams cad kyi spros pa nyid kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spros pa med pa nyid du rig par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:110b-6: gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di nyan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:110b-9: sgom pa des 'dul ba'i dbang gi phyir khams gsum du skyes pa'i sems can thams cad bsad kyang ngan song gi skye bar mi 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:110b-10: myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:110b-11: de nas bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rje chos nyid 'di'i don rgya cher ston cing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:110b-12: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya bcings la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:110b-13: khro gnyer dang bcas shing smin ma bteg ste 'bar bar blta la padma'i gdong khro zhing dgod de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:111a-0: mche ba gtsigs nas rkang pa g-yas pa bskum pa'i tshul @111a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:111a-2: rdo rje h'um zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:111a-4: h'um/ de nas 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis 'jig rten gsum po thams cad kyi 'dod pa'i dbang phyug la sogs pa 'jig rten gsum gyi bdag po rnams yang dag par bkug ste lhung bar mdzad nas dkyil 'khor du bcug nas rnam par rgyal bar mdzad bcings te dbang du byas nas btul zhing rjes su btul te bslang nas yang dam tshig gis bcings nas 'jig rten gsum gyi bdag po dbang phyug chen po chung ma dang bcas pa zhabs gnyis su phab nas mnan pa mdzad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:111a-5: de nas de rnams kyis 'jig rten gsum po thams cad du sgra chen po bsgrags te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:111a-8: yongs su skyob par mdzod cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:111a-9: bdag cag rnams ma gzir cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:111a-10: 'dir khyod la bdag cag skyabs su mchi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:111a-12: bka' bsgo ba yang bsgrub par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:111a-13: ma mo thams cad kyang btul zhing dam la btags nas dkyil 'khor yang rnam par bshig ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:111a-15: dam tshig kyang dral zhing rnam par bshigs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:111a-16: gdon thams cad kyang bzlog cing nad thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:111b-2: ngan 'gro rnams dral cing rnam par bshigs pas sgra chen po sgrogs shing 'jigs pa chen pos 'jigs par byed pa'i tshig rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das nyid la skyabs su song ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:111b-3: bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang zhal rnam par bzhad nas de rnams dkyil 'khor du bcug ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:111b-4: dam tshig gis bcings nas rdo rje rin chen gyis dbang bskur nas rang gi mtshan ma rnams rdo rjes byin gyis brlabs te rdo rje ming gi dbang bskur ba yang rjes su stsal nas sems can ma lus pa'i don du phyi'i rdo rje'i rigs su rab tu bzhag go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:111b-5: de nas rdo rje khro bo'i rdo rje las phyag na rdo rje dang 'dra ba'i dngos po'i bdag nyid can kha dog dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:111b-7: mtshon cha rnam pa sna tshogs bsnams pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:111b-8: rnam par 'gyur ba'i rdo rje'i mche ba gtsigs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:111b-10: smin ma mi bzad cing khro gnyer bsnyer ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:111b-22: gri ring dang; chu gri phyag na bsnams pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:111b-23: khro bo chen po h'um mdzad las phyung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:111b-24: bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje'i dang po'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshul gyis bzhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:112a-1: la sogs pa de rnams kyang rang gi dkyil 'khor gyi byin gyis brlabs nas phyi'i dkyil 'khor du bzhag go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:112a-2: gdon la sogs pa de dag kyang dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rim na gnas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:112a-3: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad thugs rje chen po'i thabs kyi khro bo'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms bar zhugs nas khams gsum po mtha' dag las rnam par rgyal ba rdo rje'i byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:112a-4: de nas yang dag bshad bya ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:112a-5: rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:112a-6: khams gsum rnam rgyal zhes bya ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:112a-8: dkyil 'khor dang po'i sbyor ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:112a-9: phyi yi dkyil 'khor bri bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:112a-10: de yi nang gi 'khor lo ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:112a-11: dkyil 'khor brgyad pa dag dang mtshungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:112a-12: de yi dbus su khro bo che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:112a-13: phyag na rdo rje gzhag par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:112a-14: sangs rgyas phreng la sogs pas spras //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:112a-16: zhal ni cung zad mche ba gtsigs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:112a-17: khro bcas bzhad pa'i zhal mnga' ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:112a-18: g-yon brkyang ba yis legs bzhugs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:112a-19: rdo rje h'um mdzad bsdus pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:112a-20: g-yon gyi zhabs kyis legs gnon pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:112a-21: de yi bya ba dbang phyug che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:112b-0: @112b g-yas ni dka' thub zlog ma yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:112b-1: nu ma'i steng du rab tu 'jog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:112b-3: sa sogs bcas pa'i khams rnams kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:112b-4: khro bo kun tu gzhag par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:112b-6: 'khor lo de yang mkhas pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:112b-8: phyi yi dkyil 'khor gnas rnams su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:112b-9: phyi yi dkyil 'khor tshogs rnams so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:112b-10: khro bo'i mtshan ma bzhi bo ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:112b-11: gzhu dang mda' dang ral gri dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:112b-12: 'khor lo de bzhin rtse gsum bsgreng //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:112b-13: sgo rnams kun tu bri bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:112b-14: phyi rol gnas pa'i gdon rnams kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:112b-15: sna tshogs gtor mas bkang ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:112b-16: ba dan sngon po dril btags shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:112b-17: rtse mo kha dog sna tshogs pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:112b-18: de nas 'dir 'jug pa la ni yan lag thams cad ras sngon po zung gis g-yogs shing khros pas rdo rje dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang bcas pas 'dzin par gyur pas zhugs na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:112b-19: bcom ldan 'das kyi rdo rje'i rigs kyi slob dpon du byin gyis rlob par mdzad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:112b-20: de nas brtsams te sdig pa la sogs pa rnam par grol zhing mi sad pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:112b-22: mu stegs thams cad la tshar gcod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:112b-23: phan 'dogs nus shing thams cad las rgyal ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:113a-2: de nas slob ma de bzhin du bcug la snying po byin te dkyil 'khor thams cad du'ang bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:113a-3: de nas rdo rje rnon po rtse bzhi pa 'bar ba byin la rdo rje ming gi dbang bskur bas dbang bskur nas rdo rje'i brtul zhugs sbyin par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:113a-5: phyag na rdo rje'i rdo rje ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:113a-6: ma rungs thams cad 'dul ba la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:113a-7: khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:113a-8: de nas de bzhin du 'gyur bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:113a-10: de nas sgrub pa la ni ras la bcom ldan 'das khro bo'i dbang phyug byas la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:113a-11: rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshogs kyang sems dpa' chen po thams cad bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:113a-12: phyogs thams cad du ni lha la sogs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:113a-13: ma mo rnams bri bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:113a-14: de nas bsgrub pa chen po la yang de bzhin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:113a-15: de bzhin du dngos grub mchog rnams la ni ras la bcom ldan 'das ji lta ba bzhin du byas nas de'i mdun du lag pa gnyis kyis phyag rgya bcings te bzlas brjod 'bum bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:113a-16: de nas yi ge h'um tsam gyis 'jig rten dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:113a-17: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:113a-18: ma bsgrubs par yang las thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:113a-19: de bzhin du thams cad rjes su chags par bya ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:113b-8: gnyid med bar bya ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:113b-13: gso bar bya ba la sogs pa'ang lan gcig bzlas pas byed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:113b-14: thams cad gsad pa la ni rdo rje khro bo mthar byed kyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:113b-15: thams cad rgyas gdab pa la ni khro bo'i lta ba'i bzlas pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:113b-16: thams cad gzhig pa la ni rdo rje khros pas gzhig bar bya'o; ;thams cad nges par gnon pa la ni rdo rje dang khros par phyogs der brdeg par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:113b-17: gdon thams cad dbug pa la ni rdo rje phra mo 'bigs byed kyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:113b-18: thams cad kyi snying 'byin pa la ni khros pa'i yid kyis dbyung bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:113b-19: gdug pa thams cad tshad gcad pa la ni khros ps rdo rje bskor bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:113b-20: gdug cing khros pa dogs pa la ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:113b-21: khros pas lcags phye'i sbyin sreg gis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:113b-22: bdud thams cad brlag pa la ni rang gi sa bon gyi sbyin sreg gis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:113b-23: gnod sbyin thams cad bskrad pa la ni ha ha zhes dgod cing bzlas pas so; ;klu thams cad gdon pa la ni rdo rje sa la brdegs shing bzlas pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:113b-24: lha thams cad ltung bar bya ba la ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:113b-25: lha mo rdo rje ltung byed kyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:114a-1: cad dbang du bya ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:114a-5: gdul bar bya ba la ni rdo rje srid pa gsum po gdul bar byed pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:114a-6: rnam thos sras rjes su 'brang bar bya ba la ni rnam thos sras mnan nas khros pas bzlas brjod bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:114a-7: lus ngan po mnan nas dpal dbrog par bya ba la ni rdo rje skyes bus so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:114a-8: 'dod pa'i lha dbang du bya ba la ni 'dod pa'i lha'i mdun du khros pas bzlas brjod bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:114a-9: tshangs pa ltung bar bya ba la ni rdo rje rab tu dga' ba'i phyag rgyas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:114a-10: khyab 'jug gzhig pa la ni rdo rje 'khor lo dral bas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:114a-11: dbang phyug chen po 'dul bar bya ba la ni rdo rje tri sh'u dral bas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:114a-12: ma mo thams cad gsad pa la ni rdo rje khro bo'i tshogs kyi srin mos so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:114a-13: phyi'i dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi phyag rgya dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:114a-16: gsang ba'i dngos grub rnam par gtor zhing rnam par gzhig pa la ni rdo rje khro bo'i gdug pa'i dam tshig 'jigs par byed pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:114b-0: glang po dang bcas pa'i rta la sogs pa thams cad gzhom pa @114b la ni rdo rje khro ba'i lha bas mig la reg pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:114b-1: ltung ba thams cad bslang ba la ni rdo rje khro bo bslang bas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:114b-2: thams cad spo ba la ni rdo rje khros pa'i rnal 'byor mas so; ;thams cad dbrog pa la ni rdo rje khro bo'i khu tshur dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:114b-4: 'jigs pa thams cad bskyed pa la ni rdo rje khro bo'i lta bas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:114b-5: dpung thams cad bsad pa la ni rdo rje khro bo'i gnod sbyin mos so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:114b-6: gzhan gyi dpung thams cad gzhom pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:114b-10: rgyas gdab pa dang; bsad pa la ni rdo rje khro bo ma rungs pa'i srin mos so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:114b-11: rgyal po la sogs pa mi chen po thams cad gsad pa la ni dong ka'i shing la rang gi khrag gis sbyin sreg byas pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:114b-12: lha thams cad rnam par gzhig pa la ni lha thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan phur bus gdab pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:114b-13: lha'i bdag po thams cad bsreg pa la ni lha thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan gyi yam shing gis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:114b-14: rang gi khrag gi rgyun 'bab pas sa thams cad nub par bya ba la ni rdo rje 'khro bo sa 'og gi phyag rgyas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:114b-15: khams gsum thams cad gsad pa la ni rdo rje 'jig pa'i phyag rgyas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:115a-0: 'jig rten gsum po thams cad las rnam par rgyal ba la ni 'jig rten gsum las rnam par @115a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:115a-1: rgyal ba'i mchog gi rdo rje'i khro bos so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:115a-2: khams gsum thams cad dbab pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:115a-6: nges par gnon pa la ni rdo rje sems dpa'i khro bo'i phyag rgyas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:115a-7: khams gsum po thams cad rjes su chags par bya ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:115a-14: bsgrub pa la ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje khro bo rdo rje'i dam tshig gi khro bos so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:115a-15: bde ba chen po rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig gi rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:115a-16: khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rje dam tshig ces bya ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po rdzogs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:115a-17: 'jig rten gsum rgyal gyi rtog pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:115a-18: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ngo bo nyid dag pa'i chos nyid thob pas yang chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ye shes kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di gsungs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:115a-19: 'dod chags thams cad rnam par dag pa nyid kyis kyang 'jig rten na zhe sdang thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:115b-0: dri ma thams cad rnam par dag pa nyid kyis @115b 'jig rten na sdig pa thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:115b-1: chos thams cad rnam par dag pas 'jig rten nas sems can thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:115b-2: shes pa thams cad rnam par dag pas 'jig rten na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:115b-4: gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di nyan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:115b-8: dri ma thams cad kyi nang na 'dug kyang padmo lta bur 'dod chags kyi nyes pa rnams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:115b-10: glo bur gyi nyon mongs pa rnams kyis gos par mi 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:115b-11: myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:115b-12: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug don gyi gnas 'di nyid yang rgya cher ston cing bzhin rab tu 'dzum dmul te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:115b-13: padma'i 'dab ma kha 'byed pas 'dod chags la sogs pa'i dri mas mi gos pa la blta zhing 'gro ba thams cad kyi phyir padma'i gzugs sna tshogs zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:116a-0: hr'i:/ de nas 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis padma chen po las de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i gzugs brnyan tham @116a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:116a-1: cad bcom ldan 'das dang 'dra ba'i padmas mtshan pa'i gzugs can nges par phyung nas bcom ldan 'das spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rim pa dang po'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshul du bzhugs par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:116a-2: de nas bcom ldan 'das spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug chos thams cad la gzigs pa'i ye shes kyi dbang phyug gi ye shes kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'gro ba thams cad 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:116a-3: phyi'i dkyil 'khor ci lta ba'i nang du gnyis pa ni zur bzhi pa la de bzhin du sgo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:116a-5: de nas dkyil 'khor brgyad pa'i tshul du thig bzhis thig btab pa la tshon dmar pos padma 'dab ma brgyad pa bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:116a-6: de'i dbus su bcom ldan 'das dgong par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:116a-7: de'i mdun du bcom ldan 'das padma chen po chags pa sku mdog dmar po padma'i gzugs 'dzin pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:116a-11: g-yas su bcom ldan 'das padma chen po'i gtum po dbang phyug dbang phyug chen po'i gzugs 'dzin pa gzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:116b-0: rgyab tu padma chen po khyab 'jug gi gzugs 'dzin pa sku mdog @116b nag po gzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:116b-1: g-yon du padma chen po mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa'i gzugs 'dzin pa sku mdog dkar po bzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:116b-2: g-yas kyi mtshams su padma chen po sa 'dzin pa gzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:116b-3: mtshams gnyis par padma chen po rgya mtsho chu lha'i gzugs 'dzin pa gzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:116b-4: gsum par padma chen po nyi ma'i gzugs can gzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:116b-5: bzhi par padma chen po rlung gi gzugs 'dzin pa gzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:116b-6: phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi mtshams rnams su shr'i h'i g'i dh'i lha mo bzhi gzhag par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:116b-7: thams cad kyang g-yas na rang gi mtshan ma 'dzin pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:116b-9: sgo rnams su ni 'dod chags dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:116b-12: mya ngan las 'das pa'i mtshan ma rnams gzhag par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:116b-18: de nas gos dkar po bgos te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:116b-19: gos dkar pos gdong g-yogs la padma chen po'i phyag rgya chen po me tog dang bcas par bcings te zhugs la me tog dor bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:116b-20: gang du babs pa de des bsgrub par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:117a-0: de nas padma blangs la pad ma'i ming gis dbang bskur bas dbang bskur la 'di skad ces brjod par bya zhing padma'i 'dab @117a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:117a-1: ma la blta bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:117a-3: tshon gyis nyes pas mi gos te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:117a-4: 'dam gyi nang na dag pa ltar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:117a-5: 'dod chags zhe sdang sogs de bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:117a-6: de ltar chos rnams bsgoms na ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:117a-7: blo ldan nyon mongs bcas gyur kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:117a-8: nyon mongs kun las rnam grol nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:117a-10: zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di la gzigs pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams kyi dbang phyug nyid thob par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:117a-11: de nas bcom ldan 'das spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ces mtshan btags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:117a-12: de nas brtsams te bdag nyid kyi dngos po thams cad shin tu yongs su dag pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:117a-13: bkra shis shing dngos grub thams cad byang chub kyi snying po'i bar du rjes su myong bar 'gyur zhing myur du sangs rgyas nyid 'thob par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:117a-14: slob ma gzhug pa'i cho ga rgyas pa yang de bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:117a-16: bsgrub pa la ni de bzhin du ras kyi ri mo gnyis kyis dngos grub thams cad 'thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:117a-17: de nas ma bsgrubs kyang thams cad rjes su chags par bya ba la ni padma la lan stong bzlas te sbyin par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:117a-18: thams cad gsad pa la ni padma chen po'i khro bo'i phyag rgyas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:117b-0: thams @117b cad rmongs par bya ba la ni padma chen po phag gis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:117b-1: nyon mongs pa thams cad rnam par dag par bya ba la ni padma chen po rnam par gzigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgyas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:117b-2: sa thams cad kyi bdag po nyid du bya ba la ni sa la skyil mo krung bcas pas bzlas brjod 'bum byas nas mthar mtshan mo thog thag bzlas brjod bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:117b-3: chu thams cad dbab pa la ni klu bris nas de'i steng du 'dug nas bzlas brjod 'bum bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:117b-4: thams cad snang bar bya ba la ni mun par nyi ma chen po'i 'od kyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:117b-5: rlung thams cad dgug pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:117b-8: dbang du bya ba la ni padma chen po rlung gi mchog gis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:117b-9: bde ba chen po rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig gi rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:117b-10: nyon mongs pa thams cad rnam par dag pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po rdzogs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:117b-12: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa khams gsum thams cad kyi dbang pos /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:117b-13: yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba las byung ba ye shes kyi snying po zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:117b-14: dbang bskur ba sbyin pa ni khams gsum thams cad kyi rgyal srid thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:118a-1: sbyin pa ni re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:118a-2: chos sbyin pa ni chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid 'thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:118a-3: zang zing sbyin pa ni lus dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:118a-5: sems kyi bde ba thams cad thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:118a-6: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po bzhin rab tu 'dzum pa dang bcas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:118a-7: rang gi mgo la rdo rje rin po ches dbang bskur ba'i phreng ba 'ching zhing don yod pa 'di nyid rgya cher ston te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:118a-8: dbang bskur ba thams cad kyi dam tshig rin po che zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di smras so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:118a-10: tr'am/ de nas 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi rin po che de la thams cad dbang bskur ba la sogs pa yo byad dang gter thams cad byung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:118a-11: bcom ldan 'das dang po'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs nyid kyis bzhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:118a-12: de nas bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying po dbang bskur ba thams cad kyi rin po che rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa nor bu rin po che'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:118b-0: phyi'i dkyil 'khor ni dang po'i @118b dkyil 'khor gyi tshul du byas pa'i nang du rin po che zur brgyad pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:118b-1: rin po che'i ka ba brgyad la gnas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:118b-2: dkyil 'khor brgyad pa'i tshul las rin po che'i lcugs mas yongs su bskor ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:118b-3: rdo rje rin po che'i ra ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:118b-8: rnga yab kyis nye bar mdzes pa bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:118b-9: de'i dbus su bcom ldan 'das rta'i khri la bzhugs pa dbang bskur ba'i phreng ba rang nyid 'ching bar mdzad cing zhal rnam par bzhad pa mrgad kyi mdog can gzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:118b-10: de'i mdun du byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba'i rin po che zhes bya ba rdo rje rin po che'i cod pan 'dzin pa gzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:118b-11: g-yas su rin po che chen po'i nor sbyin pa dbyig gi gter 'dzin pa gzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:118b-12: rgyab tu chos chen po rin po che'i glegs bam 'dzin pa gzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:118b-13: g-yon du rin po che chen po ro myong ba zas dang skom thams cad 'dzin pa gzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:118b-14: mtshams rnams su mchod pa'i lha mo rnams rin po che'i gdugs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:118b-19: phyi rol gyi mtshams su bum pa gang ba rnams so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:119a-1: bskur ba la sogs pa'i mtshan ma rnams gzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:119a-2: phyi rol du ni gdugs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:119a-5: bla re rnams kyis kun tu khyab par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:119a-6: de nas de bzhin du rdo rje rin chen gyi phyag rgya 'dzin pas zhugs nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:119a-7: de nas brtsams te nor thams cad 'grub pa la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad 'thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:119a-8: de nas zhugs nas kyang dbang bskur ba'i phreng ba bcings te rin po che blangs nas rin po che'i ming gi dbang bskur bas dbang bskur la sbyin pa thams cad phul nas slar dbyung bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:119a-9: slob ma gzhug pa'i cho ga rgyas pa yang de bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:119a-10: rdo rje rin po che'i dkyil 'khor ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:119a-11: sgrub pa dang dngos grub rnams kyang de bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:119a-12: de nas ma bsgrubs par dbang bskur ba thams cad thob pa la ni rdo rje rin po che'i dbang bskur ba'i phreng bas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:119a-13: bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa la ni nyin re zhing nyi ma 'char kar bzlas brjod dpag tu med pa byas pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:119a-14: chos thams cad kyi don shes pa la ni dri ma med pa'i nam mkha' la blta zhing bzlas brjod bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:119a-16: skom thams cad la sogs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:119b-0: ro thams cad thob par bya @119b ba la ni nam mkha' las yid la 'dod pa bzhin du nyin re zhing bcom ldan 'das kyi bzlas brjod stong byas pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:119b-1: shin tu mthon po thob phar bya ba la ni gdugs bzung nas bzlas brjod 'bum bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:119b-2: rnam par rgyal ba chen po thob pa la ni rin chen rgyal mtshan mchog gis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:119b-5: ming thob par bya ba la ni nyin re zhing kha thams cad du bltas nas bzlas brjod bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:119b-6: bdag po chen po thob pa la ni rin po che'i srog shing gi phyag rgyas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:119b-7: bde ba chen po rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig gi rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:119b-8: dbang bskur ba thams cad kyi rin po che'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po rdzogs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:119b-9: rin po che'i rigs kyi rtog pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:119b-10: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes phyag rgya thob pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:119b-11: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khu tshur 'dzin pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:119b-12: de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pas yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i byin gyis rlob pa rdo rje zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:120a-0: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nyid du @120a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:120a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung gi phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa ni chos thams cad thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:120a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kyi phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:120a-4: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa ni lus dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:120a-6: sems thams cad rdo rjer rdo rje'i dngos grub dam pa thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:120a-7: su la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di nyan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:120a-11: sgom pa des dngos grub thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:120a-12: phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:120a-17: sems thams cad rdo rjer rdo rje'i dngos grub dam pa thob nas myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:120a-18: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje khu tshur dam tshig chen po'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pas don gyi gnas 'di rgya cher ston te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:120b-0: bzhin rab tu 'dzum zhing rdo rje sra ba'i phyag rgya thams cad kyi dngos grub @120b kyi dam tshig ces bya ba'i snying po 'di gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:120b-2: aa:/ de nas 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la sogs pa sems can thams cad bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas phyag rgya thams cad kyis rdo rje sems dpa' nyid du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la sogs pa dngos grub mchog gi rgyus rgyas gdab bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:120b-3: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje khu tshur gyis kyang sku dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:120b-5: thugs rdo rje thams cad las phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa phyag rgya thams cad kyi dam tshig gi sems dpa' phyung nas kyang dang po'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshul gyis bzhugs par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:120b-6: de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje khu tshur de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas phyag rgya thams cad kyi rdo rje dam tshig ces bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:120b-7: phyi'i dkyil 'khor dang po'i sbyor bas bris la nang du rdo rje'i thig gi 'khor lo bri'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:120b-8: de bzhin du de'i dbus su dkyil 'khor brgyad par thig btab la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:120b-9: dbus su bcom ldan 'das rdo rje khu tshur phyag gnyis dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings pa zhal rnam par bzhad pa gzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:121a-0: de'i mdun du rdo rje sku'i mchog ces bya @121a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:121a-1: ba rdo rje bsnyems par 'dzin pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:121a-2: g-yas su rdo rje ljags zhes bya ba rdo rje lce'i mchog 'dzin pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:121a-3: rgyab tu ting nge 'dzin rdo rje zhes bya ba rdo rje 'dzin pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:121a-4: g-yon du rdo rje rdo rje zhes bya ba bsnyems par 'dzin pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:121a-5: shar lho'i mtshams su phyag rgya'i khu tshur zhes bya ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:121a-6: gnyis pa la ni nor gyi khu tshur zhes bya ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:121a-7: gsum pa la ni chos kyi khu tshur zhes bya ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:121a-8: bzhi pa la ni las kyi khu tshur zhes bya ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:121a-9: rang gi phyag rgya dang phyag mtshan yang 'dzin par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:121a-10: sgo rnams su ni rdo rje bsnyems ma la sogs pa'i phyag rgya'i lha mo rnams bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:121a-11: de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya yongs su bzung la rang nyid zhugs nas phyag rgya thams cad kyi slob dpon tu 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:121a-12: de nas brtsams te dngos grub thams cad don yod pas 'thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:121a-13: phyag rgya thams cad kyi ye shes kyi dbang phyug tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu myur ba myur bar mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:121a-14: der zhugs nas phyag rgya bcings pa bcom ldan 'das las bslab pa bya zhing rdo rje ming gi dbang bskur bas dbang bskur la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:121a-15: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:121b-0: gzugs brnyan lta bur @121b sbyor ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:121b-1: phyag rgya kun zhes bya bar bsgrags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:121b-2: dam tshig dngos grub kun ster ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:121b-3: slob ma gzhug pa yang de bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:121b-4: phyag rgya thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:121b-5: sgrub pa dang dngos grub rnams kyang de bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:121b-6: de nas ma bsgrubs pa'i las rnams kyang de bzhin /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:121b-7: phyag rgya thams cad bcing ba bsgrub pa la ni snying gar rdo rje'i khu tshur gyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:121b-8: phyag rgya thams cad bsgrub pa la ni rdo rje chen po'i khu tshur gyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:121b-9: dam tshig thams cad bsgrub pa la ni rdo rje 'dod pa'i khu tshur gyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:121b-10: sems can rjes su chags par bya ba la ni rdo rje chags pa chen po'i khu tshur gyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:121b-11: thams cad dbang du bya ba la ni rdo rje bzhad pa'i khu tshur gyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:121b-12: thams cad bcing ba la ni rdo rje bsdams pa'i khu tshur gyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:121b-13: thams cad bsdam par bya ba la ni rdo rje lu gu rgyud kyi khu tshur gyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:121b-14: thams cad lkugs par bya ba la ni rdo rje zhal zhal gyi khu tshur gyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:121b-15: thams cad btsir ba la ni rdo rje bsdams pa'i khu tshur gyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:121b-16: thams cad gsad pa la ni rdo rje khro bo'i khu tshur gyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:121b-17: thams cad bza' ba la ni rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi khu tshur gyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:121b-18: thams cad gzhig pa la ni rdo rje nges par 'tshir ba'i khu tshur gyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:121b-19: thams cad dral ba la ni rdo rje dral ba'i khu tshur gyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:122a-1: cad dbab pa la ni rdo rje 'bebs pa'i khu tshur gyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:122a-2: thams cad gar byed du gzhug pa la ni rdo rje gar gyi khu tshur gyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:122a-3: thams cad smrar gzhug pa la ni rdo rje brdung ba'i khu tshur gyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:122a-4: thams cad rengs par bya ba la ni rdo rje dmigs pa'i khu tshur gyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:122a-5: gzhan gyi dpung thams cad lkugs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:122a-6: 'phye bor bya ba la ni rdo rje chen po 'phye ba'i khu tshur gyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:122a-7: phyag rgyas thams cad dgrol ba la ni rdo rje thar pa'i khu tshur gyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:122a-8: rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyi phyag rgyas gzhig pa la ni rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi rdo rje khu tshur gyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:122a-9: gdug pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya dbye ba la ni h'um mdzad kyi rdo rje khu tshur gyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:122a-10: phyag rgya thams cad bcing pa la ni rdo rje khu tshur gyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:122a-11: phyag rgya thams cad rdo rjer bya ba la ni rdo rje khu tshur gyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:122a-12: thams cad rgyas gdab pa la ni rdo rje ma mo'i khu tshur gyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:122a-13: thams cad phye mar bya ba la ni rdo rje bzang po'i khu tshur gyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:122a-14: thams cad rnam par gzhig par bya ba la ni rdo rje gdug pa'i khu tshur gyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:122a-16: rnam par gzhom pa la ni dbang po'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:122a-17: chu'i nang du gnas shing 'chags pa la ni rdo rje gnon po'i khu tshur gyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:122b-0: gzugs mang por ston pa la ni @122b rdo rje sna tshogs pa'i rdo rje'i khu tshur gyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:122b-1: mi snang ba'i dngos grub la ni mi snang ba'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:122b-2: rgyu ba dang mi rgyu ba'i dngos po rnams 'byung ba la ni rdo rje nam mkha'i khu tshur gyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:122b-3: nam mkha' la 'gro ba'i dngos grub la ni bsdams pa'i khu tshur gyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:122b-4: rig pa 'dzin pa'i dngos grub la ni rdo rje ral gri'i khu tshur gyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:122b-5: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod pa'i dngos grub la ni rdo rje las kyi khu tshur gyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:122b-6: thams cad mkhyen pa grub pa la ni rdo rje ye shes kyi khu tshur gyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:122b-7: nor thams cad kyi dngos grub la ni rdo rje nor gyi khu tshur gyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:122b-8: phyag rgya thams cad kyi bdag po nyid la ni rdo rje phyag rgya'i khu tshur gyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:122b-9: las thams cad kyi dngos grub la ni rdo rje thams cad kyi khu tshur gyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:122b-10: dkyil 'khor thams cad grub pa la ni rdo rje 'dzin pa'i khu tshur gyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:122b-13: da ltar gyi dngos grub rnams ston pa la ni rdo rje lcags kyu mchog gi khu tshur gyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:122b-14: rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid la ni rdo rje bsnyems pa'i khu tshur gyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:122b-15: sangs rgyas nyid la ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i khu tshur gyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:122b-16: bde ba chen po'i rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig gi rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:123a-0: @123a *// phyag rgya thams cad kyi khu tshur gyi dam tshig ces bya ba rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po rdzogs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:123a-2: de nas bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad spros pa med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pas yang 'khor lo ltar yi ge bskor ba zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:123a-3: ngo bo nyid med pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:123a-4: mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:123a-5: smon pa med pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad smon pa med pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:123a-6: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pas chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:123a-7: de nas bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas don 'di rgya cher ston te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:123a-8: bzhin 'dzum bzhin du ral gri des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la 'debs shing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snying po'i mchog 'di gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:123a-10: de nas 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dus pa mdzad nas dang po'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshul gyis bzhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:123b-0: de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa chos thams cad ngo bo nyid med pas spros pa med pa'i ral gri zhes bya @123b ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'khor lo ltar yi ge bskor ba zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:123b-1: phyi'i dkyil 'khor ci lta ba'i nang du 'khor lo bris la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:123b-2: aa la sogs pa'i yi ge'i phreng ba go rims bzhin du bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:123b-3: de nas dkyil 'khor brgyad pa'i tshul gyis thig btab la de'i lte ba la bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nu gzhon nu'i cha lugs 'chang zhing 'dzum pa dang bcas pa nam mkha'i mdog can phyag bzhi dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:123b-4: ral gris de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la 'debs par gzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:123b-5: de'i mdun la sogs par de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams gzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:123b-6: phyi'i mtshams rnams su shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bzhi lung ji ltar thob pa bzhin du gzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:123b-7: sgo rnams su ni mtshan ma bzhi gzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:123b-14: glegs bam gyi phyag rgya de bzhin du chos kyi slob dpon du byin gyis brlab bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:123b-15: de nas ral gri blangs te ral gri'i ming gi dbang bskur bas dbang bskur la 'di skad ces chos 'di bshad par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:123b-16: ral gri 'di ni rtag zungs la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:123b-17: shes rab tshul 'di bkar smra zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:124a-3: sangs rgyas bstan pa bsrung phyir dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:124a-4: sems can mang po bsrung ba'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:124a-6: bsod nams dag kyang thob par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:124a-7: slob ma rnams la'ang de bzhin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:124a-8: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i dngos grub rnams kyis myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:124a-11: ma bsgrubs par yang de bzhin du las rnams 'grub par 'gyur ba ni stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin thob pa la ni thams cad nam mkha' bsgoms pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:124a-12: mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob pa la ni mtshan ma dang bral ba'i ting nge 'dzin bsgoms pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:124a-13: smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob pa la ni smon pa med pa bsgoms pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:124a-14: rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i chos kyi ye shes thob pa la ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:124a-15: nyon mongs pa thams cad gcod pa la ni chos bsgoms pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:124a-16: yi ge thams cad kyi nges pa'i tshig gi ye shes la ni spros pa med pa'i ye shes bsgoms pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:124b-0: gnas thams @124b cad du yi ges chos kyi bya ba mthong bas ni aa la sogs pa'i yi ge'i ngo bo nyid bsgoms pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:124b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub pa thob pa la ni rdo rje'i ral gri'i phyag rgyas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:124b-2: bde ba chen po rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:124b-3: 'khor lo chen po ltar yi ge bskor ba'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po rdzogs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:124b-5: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor lo'i nang du 'dus ba'i de bzhin gshegs pas yang 'khor lo chen po la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:124b-6: rdo rje mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor lo la 'jug par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:124b-7: don gyi mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor lo la 'jug par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:124b-8: chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa ni dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo la 'jug par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:124b-9: thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa ni 'khor lo thams cad la 'jug par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:125a-0: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba chos nyid kyi don 'di rgya cher @125a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:125a-1: ston cing bzhin rab tu 'dzum nas rdo rje'i 'khor lo bskor zhing rdo rje 'khor lo thams cad la 'jug pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i snying po 'di smras so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:125a-3: h'um/ de nas 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po can khams gsum tu gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du zhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs las dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi dam tshig gi sems dpa' rnams nges par byung nas dkyil 'khor gyi tshul gyis ci lta ba bzhin du bzhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:125a-4: de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje khro bo'i 'khor lo thams cad la rab tu 'jug pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas dkyil 'khor chen po thams cad du 'jug pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:125a-5: phyi'i dkyil 'khor ji lta ba bzhin du byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:125a-6: nang gi dkyil 'khor du rdo rje 'khor lo bris la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:125a-7: dbus su rdo rje'i 'khor lo bskor ba gzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:125a-8: phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad rnam pa thams cad du dkyil 'khor dang po'i tshul du gzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:125b-0: phyi'i mtshams rnams su rdo rje'i @125b rigs kyi dkyil 'khor bzhi bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:125b-1: sgo rnams su mtshan ma bzhi gzhag par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:125b-3: rdo rje sems dpa'i sku dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:125b-4: rdo rje khro bo'i sku dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:125b-5: spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sku dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:125b-6: nam mkha'i snying po'i sku rnams so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:125b-7: de nas rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgyas ji lta ba bzhin du dkyil 'khor thams cad du sangs rgyas nyid dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:125b-8: rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid du 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:125b-9: de nas 'khor lo blangs la 'khor lo'i ming gi dbang bskur ba blang bar bya zhing gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bzhi'i thig btab pa'i rigs rnams su 'jug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:125b-10: slob ma gzhug pa yang de bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:125b-12: sgrub pa yang de bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:125b-13: ma bsgrubs par yang dkyil 'khor thams cad du 'jug pa la ni rdo rje 'khor los te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:125b-14: rang gi khar bcug la gzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:125b-15: dkyil 'khor chen por 'jug pa la ni rdo rje 'khor lo chen pos so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:125b-16: de bzhin du phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa la ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor lo'i phyag rgyas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:125b-17: de bzhin du dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa la ni dam tshig chen po'i 'khor los so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:125b-18: las kyi dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa la ni rdo rje thams cad kyi 'khor los so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:126a-1: rjes su chags par bya ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:126a-8: gdug pa 'dul ba'i las rnams la ni sems dpa' chen po brgyad kyi phyag rgya g-yon na 'khor lo dang bcas pa rnams kyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:126a-9: bde ba chen po'i rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig gi rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:126a-10: dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig ces bya ba rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po rdzogs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:126a-12: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa thams cad kyi cho ga rgyas pa snod kyi mchod pa thams cad kyi mchog ces bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:126a-13: byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa nyid ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:126a-14: sems can gyi khams thams cad yongs su skyob pa nyid ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:126a-15: dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:126a-16: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yi ger 'dri ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:126b-6: mchod pa byed pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:126b-7: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i mdzod don de nyid rgya cher ston te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:126b-8: bzhin rab tu 'dzum zhing las thams cad don yod pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i snying po 'di smras so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:126b-10: aom/ de nas 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis nam mkha' thams cad las mchod pa thams cad kyi cho ga rgyas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:126b-11: nam mkha'i khams ma lus par spros par gyur nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:126b-12: bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i mdzod kyi byang chub sems dpa'i tshul gyis dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du bzhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:126b-13: de nas byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i mdzod mchod pa thams cad kyi cho ga rgyas par byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rdo rje'i mchod pa'i mchog don yod pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:126b-14: phyi'i dkyil 'khor ji lta ba de bzhin du nang du rin po che'i ka ba brgyad byas la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:126b-15: dbus su bcom ldan 'das mtshon cha sna tshogs 'dzin pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:126b-18: yan lag zla ba'i mdog la sogs pa'i kha dog lnga pa'i mdog can gzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:127a-0: @127a *// de'i phyogs thams cad du dam tshig sems dpa' rnams gzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:127a-3: 'jig rten dbang phyug la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' brgyad po /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:127a-7: phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:127a-8: stong pa nyid du smra ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:127a-11: sems can rnams yongs su skyob pa ni bla na med pa'i mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa phyag na 'dzin pa'i tshul gyis ci lta ba bzhin du gzhag go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:127a-12: phyi'i mtshams rnams su ni me tog la sogs pa rnams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:127a-13: sgo rnams su ni dbyig dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:127a-16: rin po che ste mtshan ma bzhi gzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:127a-17: de nas de bzhin du rdo rje thams cad kyis mchod pa thams cad 'thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:127a-18: zhugs nas sna tshogs rdo rje blangs la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:127a-19: sna tshogs rdo rje'i ming gis dbang bskur bas dbang bskur nas mchod pa rnam pa bzhi bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:127a-21: lus kyi las thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:127a-25: sems kyis chos kyi dbyings su spros pas mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa thams cad kyis mchod par bya zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:127b-0: phyag rgyas mchod pa gcig tu byas @127b pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:127b-1: slob ma rnams kyi gzhug pa'i las kyang de bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:127b-4: dngos grub dag kyang de bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:127b-5: de nas ma bsgrubs par yang byang chub kyi sems kyi mchod pa la ni rang gi snying gar rdo rje bsgoms pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:127b-6: ting nge 'dzin gyi mchod pa la ni thams cad dag par bsgoms pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:127b-7: dbang bskur ba'i mchod pa la ni rdo rje dbang bskur ba sna tshogs kyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:127b-8: phyag rgya'i mchod pa la ni sna tshogs rdo rje thams cad kyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:127b-9: stong pa nyid kyi mchod pa la ni aa la sogs pa'i yi ge'i lung bstan pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:127b-10: dkyil 'khor gyi mchod pa la ni rdo rje 'khor lo sna tshogs kyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:127b-11: mchod pa thams cad la ni sna tshogs rdo rjes so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:127b-12: gdug pa 'dul ba'i mchod pa la ni khro bos so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:127b-13: me tog la sogs pa dor ba la ni bzlas pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:127b-14: bde ba chen po rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig gi rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:127b-15: sna tshogs rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po rdzogs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:127b-16: nam mkha'i mdzod kyi rtog pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:127b-17: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gdug pa thams cad 'dul nus pas yang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:127b-18: ye shes kyi khu tshur yongs su 'dzin pa sems can thams cad 'dul ba ye shes kyi snying po zhes bya ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:128a-0: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i @128a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:128a-2: sems can thams cad mnyam pa nyid pas khro ba mnyam pa nyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:128a-3: sems can thams cad dul ba nyid pas khro bo dul ba nyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:128a-4: sems can thams cad chos nyid pas khro ba chos nyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:128a-5: sems can thams cad rdo rje nyid pas khro ba rdo rje nyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:128a-7: 'di ltar sems can thams cad 'dul ba ni byang chub bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:128a-8: de nas byang chub sems dpa' bdud kyi stobs thams cad rab tu 'joms pa don de nyid rgya cher ston te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:128a-9: bzhin rab tu 'dzum zhing rdo rje mche ba'i phyag rgya dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:128a-10: rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi gzugs kyis rdo rje khro bo'i gad mo zhes bya ba snying po 'di smras so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:128a-12: de nas 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis gdug pa thams cad 'dul ba'i sems dpa' rnams bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi thugs las byung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:128a-13: dang po'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshul du bzhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:128a-14: de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje gnod sbyin thabs thams cad kyis 'dul ba khro bo'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas gdug pa thams cad 'dul zhing byin gyis rlob pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i gnod sbyin gyi dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:128a-15: phyi yi dkyil 'khor tshul du ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:128b-0: phyi yi dkyil 'khor bri bar @128b bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:128b-1: de yi nang rim nyid du ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:128b-2: dkyil 'khor bzang po gru bzhi pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:128b-3: sgo bzhi pa la thig bzhir ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:128b-4: mtshon sna lngas ni rnam par bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:128b-5: ka ba brgyad ni mdun gnas par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:128b-7: de yi dbus su ci rigs par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:128b-8: rdo rje gnod sbyin gzhag bya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:128b-9: rdo rje mche ba gtsigs pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:128b-11: 'jig byed kha dog sngo ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:128b-12: ha ha zhes bzhad gsal ba'i zhal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:128b-13: de yi kun tu gnod sbyin ni //
