K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:128b-14: shin tu 'jigs pa gzhag par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:128b-15: de nyid dang po la sogs mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:128b-16: phyag na rdo rje sogs mtshan 'chad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:128b-17: phyi yi dkyil 'khor mtshams rnams su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:128b-18: mche ba'i phyag rgya bri bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:128b-19: sgo yi gnas ni thams cad du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:128b-20: rdo rje'i mtshan ma gzhag par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:128b-21: de nas 'jug pa la sogs pa 'byung ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:128b-22: rdo rje mche ba'i phyag rgya dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:128b-23: ha ha zhes bzhad pa dang bcas pas zhugs nas gdug pa thams cad 'dul nus shing myur du rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:128b-24: de nas zhugs nas rdo rje mche ba blangs nas rdo rje ming gis dbang bskur la rdo rjes rdo rje gnod sbyin nyid la bsnun no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:128b-25: de nas rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi zhal nas ha ha zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:129a-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad srung ba po gnod sbyin gyi @129a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:129a-1: bdag po phyag na rdo rje gtum por bdag grub pa yin no zhes shes par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:129a-2: de nas phyag rgya thams cad bcing bar bya zhing bsgrub par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:129a-3: de nas mchod la de bzhin du yang dag par tshim par byas nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:129a-4: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di lan gcig brjod la slar dbyung bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:129a-5: de bzhin du phyag rgya bcing ba la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas pa ni dang po la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad du bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:129a-6: phyag na rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:129a-8: dngos grub kyang de bzhin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:129a-9: ma bsgrubs par yang dang po ci lta ba bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:129a-10: gdug pa thams cad 'dul ba la ni rdo rje ma che ba'i phyag rgyas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:129a-11: sems can thams cad 'dul ba la ni khro bos ha ha zhes dgod cing zlos pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:129a-13: rang sangs rgyas kyi 'dod chags dang bral ba las ltung bar bya ba la ni chos gos dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:129a-14: snam sbyar gyi sbyin sreg gis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:129a-15: dbang bskur ba thams cad da brog pa la ni khams thams cad kyi phye ma'i sbyin sreg gis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:129a-16: thams cad rgyas gdab pa la ni rdo rje khu tshur gyi phyag rgyas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:129a-17: thams cad bcad pa la ni gzugs brnyan byas nas gtub pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:129b-0: ma rungs pa thams cad kyi @129b dkyil 'khor rnam par gzhig pa la ni rdo rje bzung nas 'jug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:129b-1: mchod pa thams cad rnam par gzhig pa la ni khros nas bzlas brjod bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:129b-2: thams cad skrag par bya ba la ni 'jigs byed kyi lta bas blta bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:129b-3: bde ba chen po rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig gi rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:129b-4: rdo rje dam tshig ces bya ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po rdzogs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:129b-5: rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi rtog pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:129b-6: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid la gnas pas yang chos thams cad kyis mchog ces bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:129b-7: chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:129b-8: thams cad don nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa don nyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:129b-9: thams cad chos nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa chos nyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:129b-10: thams cad las nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nyid du rig par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:129b-11: de nas bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:130a-0: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi don yod pa'i dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas don @130a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:130a-1: yod pa thams cad kyi dam tshig ces bya ba'i snying po 'di smras so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:130a-3: h'um/ de nas 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la sogs pa dkyil 'khor thams cad thugs las byung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:130a-4: dam tshig gi de kho na nyid kyi rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor chen po der zhugs par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:130a-5: de nas phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la nges par btud de dam tshig chen po'i dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:130a-6: dkyil 'khor chen po bris la dkyil 'khor gyi gnas brgyad du rdo rje khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor so sor gzhag go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:130a-7: de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje dam tshig thams cad kyi rdo rje byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas dam tshig thams cad kyi rdo rje zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:130a-8: dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du phyi'i dkyil 'khor bris la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:130a-9: de'i dbus su rdo rje 'khor lo bris nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:130a-10: 'khor lo'i gnas rnams su dkyil 'khor chen po la sogs pa bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:130a-11: thams cad kyang dkyil 'khor brgyad pa'i thig gis btab cing sems dpa' chen po gzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:130b-0: phyi'i dkyil 'khor du phyi rol gyi rdo rje'i @130b rigs ci ltar rjes su mthun par bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:130b-1: sgo rnams su ni rigs rnam pa bzhi'i mtshan ma rnams gzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:130b-2: de nas dam tshig chen po'i de kho na nyid kyi rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul gyis dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga thams cad rgyas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:130b-3: dam tshig chen po'i rdo rje'i de kho na nyid kyi dam tshig ces bya ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:130b-4: bde ba thams cad kyi dam tshig ces bya ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po rdzogs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:130b-6: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rnam par snang mdzad kyis yang sems can thams cad byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:130b-7: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po thams cad kyi rang bzhin yin pas sems can thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po can no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:130b-8: thams cad rdo rje'i snying pos dbang bskur ba nyid pas sems can thams cad ni rdo rje'i snying po can /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:130b-9: ngag thams cad rab tu byung bas sems can thams cad ni chos kyi snying po can no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:130b-10: sems can thams cad kyi bya ba byed pa la sbyor bas sems can thams cad ni las kyi snying po can no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:131a-0: de nas phyi rol gyi rdo rje'i rigs @131a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:131a-1: rnams kyis ca co'i sgra phyung nas chos nyid kyi don rgya cher ston cing snying po phul te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:131a-2: de nas rdo rje dbang phyug chen po rang gi de kho na nyid kyi snying po 'di phul lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:131a-4: de nas dkyil 'khor bshad par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:131a-5: kun nas zlum po thig gsum pa dkyil 'khor chen po sgo bzhi pa mtshams rnams su mdung rtse gsum pa bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:131a-6: de'i dbus su dbang phyug chen po bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:131a-7: de'i logs thams cad du tshogs brgyad pe bri bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:131a-12: gar gyi dbang phyug rnams ni phyogs rnams su'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:131a-13: mtshams su ni thod pa bzang po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:131a-15: lag na kha tvam ga dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:131a-16: ba lang rna ba'i dbang phyug go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:131a-17: thig gi mchams su ni ma mo'i tshogs thams cad gnas ji lta ba bzhin du bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:131a-18: sgo rnams su ni dbyug pa'i dbang phyug dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:131a-22: phyi rol tu ni 'byung po rnams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:131a-23: yi ge rnams bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:131a-24: de nas slob dpon thal ba gtsang mas lus bskus shing gos gtsang ma bgos te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:131a-25: mdung rtse gsum gyi mtshan ma gzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:131a-26: zhugs nas kyang snying po bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:131b-0: de nas slob @131b ma de bzhin du bcug la lag par mdung rtse gsum pa byin nas chos bshad par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:131b-1: sems can kun la phan phyir dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:131b-2: bstan pa thams cad bsrung phyir dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:131b-3: 'dod kun bdag po nyid kyi phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:131b-4: drag po'i las la gnas par gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:131b-5: de nas phyag rgya'i ye shes bslabs te gtor ma sbyin par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:131b-6: de nas brtsams te 'jigs pa med par dngos grub thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:131b-7: phun sum tshogs pa thams cad kyi bde ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:131b-8: yid bde ba thams cad rjes su myong nas drag po'i 'jig rten du mchod par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:131b-9: dkyil 'khor chen po zhi ba'i mdung thung gis mtshan ma zhes bya ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:131b-10: de nas ma mo thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das la phyag btsal te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:131b-11: dang po mgrin gcig tu thams cad dgug pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:131b-14: bsgrub pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba rang gi de kho na nyid kyi snying po 'di phul lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:131b-16: de nas 'dir dkyil 'khor bshad par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:131b-18: byang gi sgo can kyi dkyil 'khor thig btab la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:131b-19: dbus su nag po chen po gar byed bzhin pa gzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:131b-21: mtshams thams cad du ma mo brgyad bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:132a-3: dkyil 'khor gyi phyi'i mtshams rnams su ni drag po'i mkha' 'gro ma bzhi bri bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:132a-8: de rnams kyi mtshan ma ni mdung rtse gsum pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:132a-12: thod pa khrag dang bcas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:132a-16: sgo srung rnams kyi ni thod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:132a-17: rus pa'i lu gu rgyud dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:132a-20: de nas phyag rgya'i slob dpon chos spyod pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:132a-22: gos gtsang ma bgos pa thams cad za ba'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:132a-23: thams cad spyad pa la yang smad pa med de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:132a-24: zhi ba'i pho nya'i phyag rgyas zhugs la snying po bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:132a-25: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi dbus nas bhyo chen po thos par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:132a-26: de nas slob dpon ma gtogs pa gzhan thams cad ci ltar 'ongs pa zhugs par 'gyur zhing 'thob par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:132a-27: gdug pa'i dam tshig ni ma gtogs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:132a-28: de nas slob ma lag na me tog thogs pas ras kyis mig bkab la nag po chen po'i phyag rgyas bcug ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:132a-29: rna bar dam tshig chen po bhyo zhes bya ba dang sbyar bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:132a-30: de nas skrag nas me tog dor ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:132b-0: de nas gang du @132b lhung ba de lhag pa'i lhar bsgrub par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:132b-1: gal te lhung bar ma gyur na yang dor du gzhug go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:132b-2: de nas ni 'jigs par byed par nus shing rnal 'byor yang so sor 'thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:132b-3: de nas gdong g-yogs bkrol la dkyil 'khor bstan par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:132b-4: gdug pa la sogs pa'i phyag rgyas mchod nas snying po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:132b-5: rang rang gi mtshan ma sbyin par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:132b-6: de nas dam tshig bstan par bya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:132b-7: sems can thams cad rgyas gdab cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:132b-8: dam tshig sdang rnams bza' bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:132b-9: sngags rnams bstan par mi bya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:132b-10: dam tshig rnal 'byor grub ster bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:132b-11: drag po'i dam tshig mdung rtse dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:132b-12: ma mo rnams kyi rgyas 'debs pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:132b-13: gal te 'das na khyod kyi snying //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:132b-15: de nas brtsams te gang sha chen po za ba ni de ring po mi thogs par rnal 'byor 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:132b-16: gang za bar mi 'gyur ba de'i dngos grub med do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:132b-17: gal te dam tshig las 'das par ma gyur na tshogs thams cad kyis kyang mi gsod par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:132b-18: phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:132b-19: phyag rgya'i gar dang mchod pa byas nas gtor ma sbyin zhing bza' ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:132b-21: longs spyod la sogs pa'i tshim par byas nas phyir 'byung bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:133a-0: dngos grub thams cad kyi dam @133a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:133a-1: tshig ces bya ba'i phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:133a-2: de nas sbrang rtsir byed pa la sogs pa ming po gsum gyis bcom ldan 'das la phyag btsal te mgrin gcig tu rang gi de kho na nyid kyi snying po 'di phul lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:133a-4: de nas 'di'i dkyil 'khor bshad par bya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:133a-7: phyi yi dkyil 'khor bri bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:133a-8: de yi nang du dkyil 'khor ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:133a-9: gzhu yi dbyibs can bri bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:133a-10: de yi dbus su ming po ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:133a-11: mchog gsum dag ni gzhag par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:133a-12: sbrang rtsir byed dang rgyal byed dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:133a-13: don kun grub byed ces bya ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:133a-14: go cha ya lad bgos pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:133a-15: de bzhin thod pa mtshan ma 'dzin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:133a-16: lha mo'i gos dang phreng ba 'chang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:133a-17: cung zad dgod cing khro ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:133a-18: seng ge'i khri la 'dug pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:133a-20: dngos grub kun ster dag pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:133a-21: gsum ni srid gsum dag dang mtshungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:133a-22: sgo dang mtshams ni thams cad du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:133a-23: tshogs la sogs pa legs par bzhag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:133a-24: sgrub dang 'phel chen gnod sbyin dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:133a-25: gtum dang khro mchog gsod pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:133a-26: phyi rol ba dan rtse mo la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:133a-27: dril bu phreng bcas thams cad du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:133a-28: bum pa gang ba rol mchog bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:133a-29: 'byung po ma lus gtor mar bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:133b-0: glu @133b rnams glu ru len pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:133b-1: rol mo rdung bar byed pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:133b-2: de bzhin slob dpon gar byed pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:133b-3: phyag rgya kun gyis 'jug par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:133b-4: zhugs nas sgrub la dad pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:133b-5: yang nas yang du 'dud bya zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:133b-6: me tog kun gyis mchod pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:133b-7: bsgrub dang de nyid dag kyang brjod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:133b-8: 'jig rten gsum po srid gsum mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:133b-9: ngan song gsum mchod gsum rnam gsum //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:133b-10: legs ldan sbas pas grub pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:133b-11: dngos grub kun la rtag tu'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:133b-12: de nas snying po lan gcig brjod cing phyag rgya thams cad kyi g-yas pa'i mdzub mo lcags kyur byas la dgug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:133b-13: de nas dril bu dang bcas pa'i phreng ba rnams g-yo'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:133b-14: thams cad phab nas de bzhin du gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:133b-15: de nas dam tshig 'di brjod par bya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:133b-16: gal te dam tshig 'das gyur na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:133b-17: pha gsod 'gro ba gang yin dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:133b-18: ma gsod pa yi 'gro ba gang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:133b-20: rtag tu dam pa bsten par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:133b-21: dam pa min pa yongs su spang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:133b-22: gzhan la de nyid bstan mi bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:133b-23: rtag tu ming po gsum po bsgrub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:134a-0: gar gyi rol mo'i mchod pa yang byas la slob dpon @134a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:134a-1: gyis kyang phyag rgya de dang bcas pas byung ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:134a-2: 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i ye shes brjod par bya 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:134a-3: de nas brtsams te dngos grub thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:134a-4: phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:134a-7: de nas sring mo bzhis bcom ldan 'das la phyag btsal te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:134a-8: rang gi de kho na nyid kyi snying po 'di phul lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:134a-10: h'um/ de nas 'di'i dkyil 'khor bshad par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:134a-11: dkyil 'khor kun nas zlum por thig btab la thig bzhi la 'khor lo bzhi pa byas la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:134a-12: dkyil 'khor de rnams su sgo bzhir blta ba'i lha mo bzhi'i gzugs brnyan bzhag par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:134a-14: dga' ba mo ni shar du lta ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:134a-16: gzhu thogs pa la brtson pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:134a-18: gsod ma lho phyogs su lta ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:134a-22: phag mo nub tu lta ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:134a-23: lag na gser gyi gter thogs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:134a-26: zhi ba mo zhes bya ba byang du lta ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:134a-30: phyi rol gyi sgo bzhir mtshan ma dgod pa gzhag par bya 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:134b-0: de nas slob dpon dril bu dkrol zhing lag pa @134b g-yon pa kha tv'am ga dang bcas pas 'jug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:134b-1: zhugs nas snying po bzlas par bya 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:134b-3: gar gyi mchod pa bstab par bya 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:134b-4: de nas yid la 'dod pa'i dngos grub thams cad ster bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:134b-5: thams cad kyis mchod par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:134b-6: mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa gdon rnams kyis mi tshugs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:134b-7: 'di ni nor rnams kyang bskyed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:134b-8: ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa thams cad kyis mnyes par byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:134b-10: dngos grub thams cad bsgrub par nus par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:134b-11: slob ma gzhug pa yang de bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:134b-12: de rnams dang 'di dag thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:134b-14: bde ba chen po rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig gi rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:134b-15: phyi rol gyi rdo rje'i rigs kyi rtog pa rdzogs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:134b-16: phyi rol rdo rje rigs kyi dkyil 'khor bzhi'i rtog pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:134b-17: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas mu med pas mthar thug cing mu med pa'i chos dang ldan pas yang cho ga 'di mthar thug par byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi mthar thug pa byin gyis brlab pa rdo rje zhes bya ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:134b-18: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:135a-0: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa @135a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:135a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mtha' yas pa nyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:135a-3: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid pas rdo rje thams cad mu med pa nyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:135a-4: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa du ma nyid pas chos thams cad du ma nyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:135a-5: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mthar thug pa med pa nyid pas las thams cad mthar thug pa med pa nyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:135a-6: gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di nyan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:135a-11: sgom pa des sangs rgyas dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:135a-12: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mthar thug pa med pa'i mthar phyin te sgrib pa thams cad zad nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:135a-13: de bzhin gshegs pa'am rdo rje 'dzin par myur du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:135a-14: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dus te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:135a-15: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di don yod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:135a-16: thogs pa med par myur du 'grub par bya ba'i phyir lag na rdo rje la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:135a-17: legs so zhes bya ba byin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:135a-18: sems can chen po legs so legs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:135a-19: bde ba chen po legs so legs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:135a-20: theg pa chen po legs so legs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:135a-21: blo gros chen po legs so legs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:135a-22: cho ga 'di ni legs par smras //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:135b-0: sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin kun @135b gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:135b-2: rdo rje'i mdo 'di byin gyis brlabs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:135b-3: cho ga'i rgyal po bla na med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:135b-5: bdud la sogs pa thams cad kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:135b-6: de dag mi sod mi tshugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:135b-7: sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:135b-8: dngos grub dam pa thams cad kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:135b-9: sangs rgyas kun gyis gsungs pa bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:135b-11: de skad gsungs nas gsang grub phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:135b-12: rdo rje can gyis bshad pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:135b-13: kun mchog sangs rgyas mkha' bcas pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:135b-14: thams cad kyis ni mngon par bstod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:135b-15: bde ba chen po rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig gi rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:135b-16: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:135b-17: rgya gar gyi mkhan po a'a ts'ar+ya shrad dh'a ka ra barma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-005:135b-18: zhus chen gyi lo tstsha ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la pha ba pa'o //
